backstory: A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away...

episodes.title: The Foyer

creature.name: Bob
creature.introduction: Hi, my name is Bob, but you can call me Bobby.
creature.story: I was born without vowels. Can you help me find some vowels?

episodes.room_description: You find yourself in an ugly room with purple wallpaper.

traps.text: The treasure chest lid was rusty and sharp. You cut your hand and contract tetanus.
